parsed_email.subject: Fresh water supply required - MV Ocean Trader
parsed_email.body_text:
Dear Operations Team,

We need to arrange fresh water supply for MV Ocean Trader arriving
at Singapore port on January 20th, 2024.

Required quantity: 50 tons
Estimated arrival: 20-Jan-2024 08:00 local time
Berth: Terminal 3, Berth 12

Please confirm availability and provide pricing quotation.

Best regards,
Port Services Team

classification.summary: Request for fresh water supply for MV Ocean Trader arriving on January 20th, 2024, with a required quantity of 50 tons.
